title: ESET Mobile Security v1.1.603.893 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009			


Requirements: Android 2.0.1 or higher
Overview: Protect your Android smartphone and tablet from emerging threats.
Keep your phone or tablet secure and its contents away from prying eyes with award-winning ESET antivirus technology.

Use your mobile device without worrying about emerging threats or privacy breaches. Stay secure while you do your internet banking, connect to public Wi-Fi, exchange emails or go online shopping. Your sensitive data is kept safe against abuse and you are protected against malware hidden in applications. The Anti-Theft helps you locate or block access to your device in case it is lost or stolen.
ANTI-THEFT FEATURES
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simple SMS commands to help you maintain control over your lost or stolen device
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Remote LOCK: Lock phone remotely by SMS to prevent unauthorized access to data
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Remote WIPE: Delete contacts, messages and memory cards
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Localization: LOCATE lost or stolen phone by a remote SMS command
OTHER FEATURES TO SIMPLIFY YOUR MOBILE LIFE
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Anti-Malware Protection: Scans all downloaded and accessed applications and files for malware
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ SMS/MMS Antispam: Block SMS/MMS messages from unknown numbers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Call Blocking: Block unwanted incoming and outgoing calls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Security Audit with Built-in Task Manager: Monitor vital phone functions, including battery life, free disk space, running processes, Bluetooth and device visibility
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Program interface localized in 24 languages: English, Polish, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Russian, Hungarian, Spanish, German, Portuguese Brazilian, Dutch, French, Romanian, Turkish, Swedish, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Italian, French Canadian, Korean, Spanish Latin, Czech, Hebrew and Slovak
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Some features are not available for tablets which do not support calling and messaging


                                  By bobiras2009
